data.description:
# Ion Arcades

Ion Arcades brings the excitement of flying your spaceship in your environment. If you enjoy drones or RC planes, you’ll feel right at home using your controllers to fly your ship through asteroid fields and space stations, dodging traps, and competing against other players in intense Last Man Standing online multiplayer battles.

# Game Features:
- **Diverse Game Modes:** Engage in both single-player and online multiplayer modes. Practice your skills in free single-player tutorials, then jump into online battles where you can create public or private lobbies for up to four players.
- **Flexible Controls:** Customize your controls and settings through our futuristic user interface that puts you right in the heart of the action. Choose from different input layouts to suit your style or even use a gaming controller.
- **Collect and Conquer:** Select from different arcades with their unique challenges and collect new weapon systems.
- **Mixed Reality and VR:** Switch between Camera passthrough and VR at any time. For Quest 2 users, we recommend VR mode for the best experience.

# Additional Information:
- **Starter Pack:** New users receive 200 coins to kickstart their multiplayer experience. Unlike multiplayer you can enjoy the current single-player tutorials without needing coins.
- **Active Project:** We’re continually working on new Arcades and upgrades including more spaceships, maps, and weapons.
- **Feedback Welcome:** Join our Discord server to share your feedback or report any issues.
